problem.p: A block is suspended by a single vertical string from the ceiling. Which force forms a "Newton's 3rd law pair" with the weight of the block?

choicegroup.choice: the weight of the block has no "Newton's 3rd law pair" because the block is in equilibrium
the force of tension in the string acting on the block
the normal force from the ceiling acting on the string.
the gravitational force exerted on the block by the Earth
the gravitational force exerted on the Earth by the block
